thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel mocks names at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel mocks names at the Oscars

title: Jimmy Kimmel mocks names at the Oscars
text: Jimmy Kimmel under fire for mocking names of non-white people while hosting the Oscars Jimmy Kimmel made jokes about the names of 2 nonwhite people at the Oscars Made 2 jokes about Mahershala Ali - Best Supporting Actor winner for Moonlight One was about the name of Ali's daughter and how it couldn't be 'Amy' He also asked the audience to say 'Mahershala' in unison Some on social media said this was indicative of lack of cultural understanding Kimmel also joked about the name of a woman named 'Yulerie,' seeming to imply her name was not a really a name
